item.title: 艰难路段完工后，跨山石油管道接近完工
item.description: 跨山输油管道的扩建工程已接近尾声，在此之前，政府所有的公司已经完成了不列颠哥伦比亚省的一个山区路段，该段输油管道曾一度推迟开始运营。【原文：The expansion of the Trans Mountain oil pipeline is almost complete after the government-owned company finished a mountainous segment in British Columbia that had delayed the start of operations.】

item.title: 达利欧为他在中国数十年的投资辩护
item.description: 桥水联合创始人雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）为他在中国长达数十年的投资进行了辩护，并承诺他不会放弃这个世界第二大经济体，即使他发现了中国存在的所有问题，以及与他自己的国家--美国--发生战争的风险。【原文：Bridgewater Associates founder Ray Dalio defended his decades-long investment in China and pledged he won’t abandon the world’s second-largest economy even with all of the problems there he’s identified and the risks of a war with his own country, the US.】

item.title: 世邦魏理仕称，工匠短缺将导致加拿大住房危机持续存在
item.description: 全球最大的房地产公司之一的一位高层管理人员表示，加拿大没有足够的熟练技工来摆脱目前的住房短缺问题，这可能会对该国的社会结构造成长期破坏。【原文：Canada doesn’t have enough skilled tradespeople to build its way out of its current housing shortage, threatening long-term damage to the country’s social fabric, according to a top executive at one of the world’s biggest real estate firms.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Televisa 公司将从 AT&T 公司购买 Sky 公司剩余股份

item.title: 削减成本推动利润超预期，李维斯大幅上涨
item.description: Levi Strauss & Co.第一季度的销售额和利润高于预期，助推了该公司更为乐观的全年业绩展望。【原文：Levi Strauss & Co. jumped after higher-than-expected sales and profit in the first quarter helped fuel a more optimistic full-year outlook.】

item.title: 美国人为何再次关注预算赤字？
item.description: 联邦预算赤字是美国选民和经济时好时坏的一个问题，如今这个问题又出现了。继唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的减税政策之后，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统领导下的支出激增扩大了财政收入与资金投入之间的差距，而利率的飙升则使债务负担更加昂贵。由于预测显示未来几年将出现超大缺口，而华盛顿的政客们在这个问题上又一再采取边缘政策，对赤字的担忧开始令金融界感到不安。【原文：The federal budget deficit, an on-again, off-again concern for the US electorate and economy, is back on. A spending surge under President Joe Biden, following tax cuts under Donald Trump, swelled the gap between revenue raised and funds committed just as a spike in interest rates made carrying debt more expensive. With projections pointing to outsize gaps for years to come, and politicians in Washington in repeated brinkmanship over the issue, concern about deficits is beginning to rattle finan】

item.title: 企业倒闭潮加速，企业破产数量猛增
item.description: 套用一句老话，破产会慢慢发生，然后一下子发生。对于各种规模的企业来说，"一下子 "正在发生。【原文：Going bankrupt happens slowly, then all at once, to paraphrase an old saying. For businesses of all sizes, all at once is happening now.】

item.title: 美国数据显示通胀压力缓解，美元走软
item.description: 周三，美元指数创下近四周来的最大跌幅，原因是美国服务业的价格压力有所缓解，而且美联储主席鲍威尔表示，他希望在开始降息之前看到通胀率持续升至美国央行2%的目标。【原文：A dollar gauge saw its biggest drop in nearly four weeks on Wednesday as price pressures in the US services industry eased and Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said he wants to see inflation move sustainably to the US central bank’s 2% goal before starting to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 挪威 1.5 万亿美元基金对力拓巴西矿山表示担忧
item.description: 挪威1.5万亿美元主权财富基金的道德顾问向力拓集团提出了对巴西一座矿山的环境影响的担忧，这再次引发了对该基金作为该公司投资者的未来角色的质疑。【原文：The ethics adviser to Norway’s $1.5 trillion sovereign wealth fund has raised concerns with Rio Tinto Group about the environmental impact of a mine in Brazil, reviving questions about the fund’s future role as an investor in the company.】

item.title: 巴黎俱乐部将埃塞俄比亚与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成协议的最后期限延长至六月
item.description: 据说，主要由发达国家债权国组成的巴黎俱乐部已将埃塞俄比亚与国际货币基金组织达成初步救助协议的最后期限延长了三个月，至 6 月底。【原文：The Paris Club of mostly developed country creditors is said to have extended a deadline for Ethiopia to reach a preliminary bailout deal with the International Monetary Fund by three months to the end of June.】

item.title: 美联储继续等待减息，3 月份债券收益率罕见地达到 0.0
item.description: 由于债券市场仍在努力从数十年来最严重的亏损中恢复过来，免税债券带来了如今算得上是好消息的消息：3 月份，投资者没有损失一分钱。【原文：With the bond market still struggling to recover from some of the worst losses in decades, tax-exempt debt delivered what counts these days as good news: In March, investors didn’t lose so much as a penny.】

item.title: 欧洲足球联赛寻求 LionTree 帮助其出售少数股权
item.description: 欧洲顶级男子职业篮球联赛（EuroLeague）首席执行官保柳斯-莫泰尤纳斯（Paulius Motiejunas）表示，该公司正在探索通过出售少数股权筹集资金。【原文：EuroLeague, the top tier of men’s professional basketball in Europe, is exploring raising capital through the sale of a minority stake, Chief Executive Officer Paulius Motiejunas said.】

item.title: 智利政客呼吁从中国廉价进口产品中拯救本地钢铁
item.description: 智利政界人士正在极力说服该国唯一一家钢铁制造商推翻因廉价中国合金涌入而关闭业务的决定，这是对该国自由贸易决心的考验。【原文：Chilean politicians are clamoring to convince the country’s only steelmaker to overturn a decision to shutter operations due to an influx of cheap Chinese alloy, testing the nation’s free-trade resolve.】

item.title: 私人信贷基金正在洽谈收购 Trivium Packaging 公司的融资事宜

item.title: 鲍威尔称美联储在决定减息前有时间评估数据
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，尽管最近的物价上涨并未改变利率的大体轨迹，但决策者将等待通胀走低的更明确迹象出现后再降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled policymakers will wait for clearer signs of lower inflation before cutting interest rates, even though a recent bump in prices didn’t alter their broader trajectory.】

item.title: 受劳力士丑闻影响的秘鲁总统寻求国会支持
item.description: 秘鲁不受欢迎的总统很可能会在周三的投票中得到同样不受欢迎的国会的支持，因为双方都无视公众要求他们下台的呼声。【原文：Peru’s unpopular president is likely to receive the backing of the equally-disliked congress in a vote on Wednesday, as both sides defy the public clamor for them to quit.】

item.title: WSP Global 遭遇做空者追杀，股价暴跌

item.title: 裁决后意大利电信可能从意大利收回 10 亿欧元
item.description: 意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）可能会从意大利政府那里拿回约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元），因为罗马上诉法院在一起可追溯到 20 世纪 90 年代末的法律案件中做出了有利于这家前电话垄断商的裁决。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA may get back about €1 billion ($1.1 billion) from the Italian government after a Rome appeal court ruled in favor of the former phone monopolist in a legal case dating back from the late 1990s.】

item.title: 特朗普 SPAC 投资人承认内幕交易罪
item.description: 杰拉尔德-什瓦茨曼（Gerald Shvartsman）在周三的听证会上认罪，他是三名被控与唐纳德-特朗普的媒体公司上市有关的内幕交易的投资者之一。【原文：Gerald Shvartsman, one of three investors charged with insider trading in connection with the listing vehicle that took Donald Trump’s media company public, pleaded guilty at a hearing Wednesday.】

item.title: Natwest 是泰晤士河水务公司债务风波的核心贷款代理机构
item.description: 据两位熟悉此事的人士透露，Natwest Group Plc 是泰晤士河水务公司母公司 1.9 亿英镑（2.39 亿美元）贷款的代理人，这笔贷款将于本月晚些时候偿还。【原文：Natwest Group Plc is the agent on a £190 million ($239 million) loan taken by Thames Water’s parent that’s due for repayment later this month, according to two people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be named because details are private.】

item.title: 福特在美国的销量因混合动力车型交付量大幅增长而上升
item.description: 尽管重新设计的 F-150 皮卡的推出费尽周折，但由于对油电混合动力汽车的强劲需求，福特汽车公司第一季度的美国汽车销量增长了 7%。【原文：Ford Motor Co.’s US auto sales rose 7% in the first quarter on strong demand for gas-electric hybrids, despite a laborious launch of a redesigned F-150 pickup truck.】
